law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Catastrophic health emergency" has the meaning stated in § 14-3A-01 of the Public Safety Article.
"Deadly agent" has the meaning stated in § 14-3A-01 of the Public Safety Article.
"Exposure to a deadly agent" has the meaning stated in § 14-3A-01 of the Public Safety Article.
"Health care facility" has the meaning stated in § 19-114(d)(1) of this article.

section.section: "Health care practitioner" has the meaning stated in § 19-114(f) of this article.
"Health care practitioner" includes an individual licensed or certified as an emergency medical services provider under § 13-516 of the Education Article.

text.section:
"Health care provider" means:
A health care facility; or
A health care practitioner.
